alert.note: Alert for Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 29 at 11:04AM MST until November 29 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow ongoing. Additional snow accumulations around 1 inch possible. * WHERE...The Northern Front Range Foothills. * WHEN...Until 2 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Roads will likely become slick and hazardous. Travel could be difficult at times. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org. Roads will be slick resulting in slow and hazardous travel. Allow extra time to reach your destination.

area.areaDesc: Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet
